https://openminds.om-i.org/props/abbrevi._instruction: Enter the official abbreviation of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/abbrevi.label: Abbreviation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/abbrevi.name: abbreviation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna._instruction: Enter any alternate names, including any alternative abbreviations, for this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna.label: Alternate name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna.name: alternateName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/correct._instruction: Enter the refined or corrected name of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/correct.label: Corrected name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/correct.name: correctedName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasAnno._instruction: Add all atlas annotations which define this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasAnno.label: Has annotation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasAnno.name: hasAnnotation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare._instruction: Add all anatomical parent structures (or version of the structures) for this parcellation entity as defined within corresponding brain atlas version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare.label: Has parent
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare.name: hasParent

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this parcellation entity version that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/relatio._instruction: Add all relations (qualitative or quantitative) of this parcellation entity version to other anatomical entities.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/relatio.label: Relation assessment
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/relatio.name: relationAssessment

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version._instruction: Enter a short description (or summary) of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation entity version in comparison to its preceding versions. If this parcellation entity version is the first version, leave blank.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.name: versionInnovation
